description: This file is a C header (.h) file that declares prototypes for functions related to a UDP Echo Server object in a broadband management system. It includes licensing information, module description, and function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing the UDP echo server object.

methods.name: BbhmCreateUDPEchoServer
methods.description: Creates and returns a handle for the UDP Echo Server object, given container, owner, and reserved contexts.

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoCreate
methods.description: Creates the UDPEcho object with specified container, owner, and reserved handles.

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoRemove
methods.description: Removes or deallocates the UDPEcho object identified by the given handle.

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls the necessary objects into the UDPEcho object, setting up dependencies or required components.

methods.name: BbhmUdpechoInitialize
methods.description: Initializes the UDPEcho object, preparing it for operation.
